name: The Quran Journal 1.0
description: This Notion template is valued at $40, reflecting the comprehensive features it offers. But we’ve priced it at just $13 to make it accessible to students and anyone facing financial challenges. If this price is still a barrier for you, please email us at help.ahsana.co@gmail.com, and we’ll gladly work with you to ensure you can benefit from it.Looking for the French version? Click hereFor the premium version click here.Do you find it challenging to stay consistent with your recitation and memori
features: Surah Tracker:Easily monitor your progress and stay on track. Use the Strength feature to keep an eye on your memorization and focus on areas that need improvement.; Tafsir Notes Section: Dive deep into the meaning of each surah using the provided prompts or effortlessly import your existing Tafsir notes into the designated space.; Juz Tracker:Easily mark and track your completion of each Juz.; Habit Tracker:Cultivate positive habits to enhance your connection with the Quran.; Reflection Page:Transform the page into whatever inspires you.It's your space to make it yours!; Weekly Planning:Plan your Quran sessions for a productive week.; Bonus:Useful links at your fingertips + all surah linked toQuran.com
